definition: a form of all fours in which the players bid for the privilege of naming trumps, to get a grip on
details:
noun
- a form of all fours in which the players bid for the privilege of naming trumps
- any undertaking that is easy to do
= synonyms: snap
- stable gear consisting of a band around a horse's belly that holds the saddle in place
= synonyms: girth
verb
- to get a grip on
- to make sure of
- to tie a cinch around
= example: to tie a cinch around
= synonyms: girth
